name: resume
description: Simple project to generate resume flavors

scripts.start: resume export clark.nate.slick.pdf --theme slick && resume export clark.nate.flat.pdf --theme flat && resume export clark.nate.elegant.pdf --theme elegant && resume export clark.nate.kwan.pdf --theme kwan && resume export clark.nate.modern.pdf --theme modern && resume export clark.nate.short.pdf --theme short

author: Nate Clark
